title: (x) Intel Core 2 Duo tech sans - Neo Sans Intel {Geoff}
content:
Hi All!

Just seen this recently and wondered if anyone knew what face it is, I'm guessing it might well be custom to Intel - if this is the case can anyone recommend anything similar?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/intel_6022.gif)

Ta very much!

Si
author: Duckworth

comments.content: [Neo Sans Intel](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061709/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/2006/01/in_use_neo_sans.cfm)â€”Custom version of [Neo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061709/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=C.117386.0.0) and [Neo Tech](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061709/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=C.117387.0.0) by Sebastian Lester.

Thanks very much!

8 min response... that's quick!!!
